definition.en: The business function (e.g. sell, lease, repair, dispose) of the offer or component of a bundle (TypeAndQuantityNode). The default is http://purl.org/goodrelations/v1#Sell.
definition.de: The business function (e.g. sell, lease, repair, dispose) of the offer or component of a bundle (TypeAndQuantityNode). The default is http://purl.org/goodrelations/v1#Sell.
definition.fr: The business function (e.g. sell, lease, repair, dispose) of the offer or component of a bundle (TypeAndQuantityNode). The default is http://purl.org/goodrelations/v1#Sell.
definition.es: The business function (e.g. sell, lease, repair, dispose) of the offer or component of a bundle (TypeAndQuantityNode). The default is http://purl.org/goodrelations/v1#Sell.

title.en: ActivityPub and friends – An ontology of the fediverse
title.de: ActivityPub und Freunde - Eine Ontolgie des Fediverse
title.fr: ActivityPub et ses amis - Une ontologie du fediverse
title.es: ActivityPub y sus amigos - Una ontología del fediverso
